subject: Basketball
Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The United States will play Spain and Argentina in a pre-Olympic warm-up event in Barcelona, Spain, marking the 20th anniversary of the Dream Team’s arrival for the 1992 Olympics.
snippet: The United States will play Spain and Argentina in a pre-Olympic warm-up event in Barcelona, Spain, marking the 20th anniversary of the Dream Team’s arrival for the 1992 Olympics.
